name: Grasp
description:
------------------------------------------------------
                      G R A S P
------------------------------------------------------

Code - The Propogation

Art - Sam Demaine

Sound - Reid

Note: Game is not fully finished but will be updated and re released when fully developed

------------------------------------------------------

What drives you? 
What creates the desire to press on? 
Grasp is an ordeal of diligence, and more importantly, hope. 
Keep it alive as you try to find your freedom.

------------------------------------------------------
Controls: 
Up/Down/Left/Right = Movement 
[Z] = WallClimb

------------------------------------------------------
